      void connectToServer(java.net.InetAddress adress)
      Connects to the server at given address.
      TowerCoordinates determineMove(int x, int y)
      Determines the next move to play, asks TUI in case of Human Player or the method of Computer Player, handles exceptions before server communication (local check).
      private void disconnect()
      Disconnects from the server.
      java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.Integer>> getBoardData()
      Gets the board data from the board for use by the UI.

      Creates a new TUI and starts it.
      void makeMove(int x, int y, int id)
      Makes the moves on the board, handles boards exception after getting the coordinates from the server.
      void readServerMessage()
      Reads a server message from the socket, and calls appropriate methods.
      void readTUIMessage(java.lang.String message)
      Reads the message, calls appropriate methods.
      void sendServerMessage(java.lang.String message)
      Sends a message to the server via the socket.
      void start()
      Starts the TUI, so starts the communication with the user.
      void startGame(java.lang.String message)
      Makes the connection to server, calls readTUIMessage(), if rules are fine setup game, else notify TUI.

      • makeMove

        public void makeMove(int x,
                     int y,
                     int id)
        Makes the moves on the board, handles boards exception after getting the coordinates from the server.
        Parameters:
        x - X Coordinate of the Tower, the player is playing.
        y - Y Coordinate of the Tower, the player is playing.
        id - ID of the player whose move it is.

      • determineMove
